title: crbiodiversity: Biodiversity data of Costa Rica
code: library(tidyverse) library(spocc) library(sf) library(crgeo) library(crgrids) library(crbiodiversity) loc <- get_locations("Agalychnis callidryas") #> 2  #> 3 head(loc) #> # A tibble: 6 × 6 #>   name                               longitude  latitude  prov  date       key   #>   <chr>                              <chr>      <chr>     <chr> <date>     <chr> #> 1 Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862) -83.950451 10.325009 gbif  2023-01-02 4011… #> 2 Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862) -83.953133 10.33412  gbif  2023-01-03 4011… #> 3 Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862) -84.06818  10.4503   gbif  2023-01-03 4014… #> 4 Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862) -84.068276 10.450406 gbif  2023-01-03 4014… #> 5 Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862) -84.978972 10.707888 gbif  2023-01-07 4067… #> 6 Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862) -84.708118 10.438699 gbif  2023-01-07 4014… get_map("Agalychnis callidryas") #> 2  #> 3 #> Warning: attribute variables are assumed to be spatially constant throughout #> all geometries

what: Download species occurrence data for Costa Rica — get_locations
title: Download species occurrence data for Costa Rica — get_locations
text: Search retrieve species occurrences Costa Rica gbif (GBIF) iNaturalist (iNaturalist). function wrapper occ function spocc package.

title: Download species occurrence data for Costa Rica — get_locations
Download species occurrence data for Costa Rica — get_locations
text: species_name Genus species (example, "Desmodus rotundus") sf Logical. Return spatial (sf) data frame

title: Download species occurrence data for Costa Rica — get_locations
text: data frame sf = FALSE (default), sf object sf = TRUE.

title: Download species occurrence data for Costa Rica — get_locations
code: loc <- get_locations("Agalychnis callidryas") #> Error in occ(query = species_name, from = c("gbif", "inat"), geometry = st_bbox(cr_outline),     has_coord = TRUE): could not find function "occ" head(loc) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'loc' not found
